word: What is life in the ocean like?
It is very dark and cold there.
In the ocean larger and stronger animals eat smaller and weaker ones.
meaning: 바다에서는 더 크고 강한 동물이 더 작고 약한 동물을 먹는다.

word: The octopus uses its eight tentacles to grab food.
meaning: 문어는 여덟 개의 촉수로 먹이를 잡는다.

word: Dolphins adapted to life in the water.
Their legs turned into strong tails.
Their body temperature stays about the same no matter what the outside temperature is.
meaning: 외부 온도가 어떻든 그들의 체온은 거의 동일하게 유지된다.

word: Killer whales hunt in packs of up to 40.
Dolphins catch a lot more food than they would alone.
meaning: 돌고래는 혼자일 때보다 훨씬 더 많은 먹이를 잡는다.

word: They communicate with each other about where the fish are.
meaning: 그들은 물고기 위치에 대해 서로 소통한다.

word: Sharks came from the first fish.
Shark's teeth come in all sizes and shapes.
meaning: 상어 이빨은 모든 크기와 모양으로 나온다.

word: These two fins keep sharks from tipping from side to side.
meaning: 이 두 지느러미는 상어가 좌우로 기울어지는 것을 막아준다.

word: The sharks seemed to be resting.
